pages.title: ABOUT US
pages.h1: Welcome to our Virtual Gallery Experience!
pages.content1: At ArtVista, we believe in the trans-formative power of art. Our platform is where artists and art enthusiasts from around the globe can connect, explore, and share their passion for creativity.
pages.content2: Founded in 2024, ArtVista aims to revolutionize art appreciation through a digital lens.
pages.content3: strive to democratize art, making it accessible to everyone, everywhere. Through our platform, we aim to create a global community of artists and art lovers who celebrate creativity.

array: Immersive Virtual Galleries: Explore stunning virtual galleries from home.
NFT Artwork: Discover and collect unique NFT artworks from talented artists.
Community and Collaboration: Join a vibrant community of artists and art enthusiasts.
Accessibility: Enjoy art and connect with others, regardless of physical location.

pages.final: Join us on this creative journey! Explore, connect, and be inspired through art at ArtVista!

pages.title: Welcome to ArtVista!
pages.content: ArtVista is your ultimate platform for exploring and sharing stunning digital art. Create, upload, and showcase your artwork in our virtual gallery. Join our community to connect with fellow artists and art enthusiasts.

pages.title: Privacy Policy
pages.content: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy document outlines the types of personal information that is received and collected by ArtVista and how it is used.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at privacy@artvista.com.
